title: Yemen May Not Offer Best Model For Obama's ISIS Plan
teaser: Gregory Johnsen, author of The Last Refuge: Yemen, al-Qaeda and America's War in Arabia, tells Robert Siegel that President Obama chose a flawed model when he compared the effort to defeat ISIS to U.S. attacks against suspected terrorists in Yemen.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
